channel.title: P I C K U P on 562/659 Server
channel.description:
@base: project dungeonfest @
Correction for people don't understand : He's trying to say that when there is an item on the ground, if you're not directly on top of the item you will not pick it up
What I have right now: When I try to pickup an item, i have to stand on the item I want to pickup to actually take it...
What I want: To pick up an item standing far away, close by, ontop of it, all around i want to be able to pick up any item from any distance away. Please someone help me out, not even sure where I would look for this.
Thanks, P00n99range

someone2:

Why the fuck do you want that.
